descriptionMdByRank.1:
Increase ATK by **12%**. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains **10%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 14s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to 3 times.
When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain **40%** Basic DMG Bonus for 10s. This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain **50%** Basic DMG Bonus for 10s. This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.
